item.title: 英国宣布更多制裁，警方警告俄罗斯试图规避措施
item.description:
Britain warned that Russia was trying to circumvent sanctions as it announced 46 new measures against individuals and groups from other countries it said were involved in Russia's military supply chains.翻译:英国警告说，俄罗斯试图规避制裁，宣布针对参与俄罗斯军事供应链的其他国家的个人和团体采取 46 项新措施。

The latest entities to be sanctioned included businesses operating in China, Turkey, Serbia, the United Arab Emirates and Uzbekistan, Britain's foreign ministry said.翻译:英国外交部表示，最新受到制裁的实体包括在中国、土耳其、塞尔维亚、阿拉伯联合酋长国和乌兹别克斯坦运营的企业。

The Chinese embassy in London said it condemned the move and would counter anything that undermined its interests.翻译:中国驻伦敦大使馆表示谴责此举，并将对任何损害其利益的行为予以反击。

Britain has staunchly supported Ukraine since Russia invaded in February 2022, and said it was targeting third-country suppliers in order to limit Russia's ability to get around sanctions to obtain restricted goods.翻译:自俄罗斯于 2022 年 2 月入侵乌克兰以来，英国一直坚定支持乌克兰，并表示其目标是第三国供应商，以限制俄罗斯绕过制裁获取限制商品的能力。

"We will continue to ratchet up pressure on Putin and crack down on third parties providing restricted goods and technology to Russia, wherever they may be," junior foreign minister Anne-Marie Trevelyan said.翻译:“我们将继续加大对普京的压力，并打击向俄罗斯提供受限制商品和技术的第三方，无论他们在哪里，”外交部副部长安妮-玛丽·特里维廉表示。

Britain sanctioned 31 people and entities it said were linked to the design and manufacture of drones and missile parts and the import of electronic components, four UAE-based entities it said were involved in trading Russian oil, and others linked to the Wagner mercenary group.翻译:英国制裁了 31 名与无人机和导弹零部件设计和制造以及电子元件进口有关的个人和实体，据称涉及俄罗斯石油贸易的 4 家位于阿联酋的实体，以及与瓦格纳雇佣军集团有关的其他实体。

The designations also included a Belarusian defence organisation Britain said had manufactured military technology used by Minsk to support Russia's war effort.翻译:这些指定还包括一个白俄罗斯国防组织，英国称该组织制造了明斯克用于支持俄罗斯战争努力的军事技术。

China said it was firmly opposed to the sanctions. "We urge the UK government to immediately correct its mistake and lift sanctions on Chinese companies," the embassy said.翻译:中方表示坚决反对制裁措施。 “我们敦促英国政府立即纠正错误，取消对中国企业的制裁，”使馆表示。

"The Chinese government will take firm and effective measures to safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of Chinese enterprises.翻译:“中国政府将采取坚定有效措施，维护中国企业的合法权益。

Meanwhile, Britain's National Crime Agency said it had issued a warning to banks and other financial institutions and members of the UK regulated sector about Russia seeking to obtain sanctioned goods through intermediary countries.翻译:与此同时，英国国家犯罪局表示，已向银行和其他金融机构以及英国监管部门的成员发出警告，称俄罗斯试图通过中间国获取受制裁的商品。

"Sanctions imposed on Russia as a result of its invasion of Ukraine have had a significant impact on its ability to purchase products, including military supplies, on international markets," the NCA said.翻译:NCA 表示：“俄罗斯因入侵乌克兰而对其实施的制裁对其在国际市场上购买包括军事用品在内的产品的能力产生了重大影响。”

"However, in an effort to circumvent these controls, Russia is using complex supply chains and alternative supply routes to acquire sanctioned products."翻译:“然而，为了规避这些控制，俄罗斯正在利用复杂的供应链和替代供应路线来获取受制裁的产品。”

Since the Russian invasion of Ukraine, Britain has sanctioned more than 1,600 individuals and about 250 entities.翻译:自俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来，英国已制裁了超过 1,600 名个人和约 250 个实体。

Reporting by Sarah Young, Alistair Smout and Michael Holden in London and Twinnie Siu in Hong Kong; Editing by Alexandra Hudson翻译:Sarah Young、Alistair Smout 和 Michael Holden 在伦敦以及 Twinnie Siu 在香港的报道；亚历山德拉·哈德森编辑

item.title: 一带一路：意大利与中国有何协议？
item.description:
Italy has told China that it is quitting the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), two government sources told Reuters on Wednesday, ending months of doubt over Rome's future in Beijing's ambitious infrastructure project.翻译:两名政府消息人士周三告诉路透社，意大利已告诉中国，它将退出“一带一路”倡议，结束了数月来对罗马在北京雄心勃勃的基础设施项目中的未来的怀疑。

Italy signed a preliminary accord with China in March 2019 that made it the only Group of Seven (G7) country to join the BRI project, which was launched by Chinese President Xi Jinping in 2013.翻译:意大利于 2019 年 3 月与中国签署了初步协议，成为唯一加入中国国家主席习近平于 2013 年发起的“一带一路”项目的七国集团 (G7) 国家。

The then Italian prime minister, Giuseppe Conte, hoped the deal would boost Italy's underperforming economy, but over the past four years it has produced little benefit.翻译:时任意大利总理朱塞佩·孔特希望这项协议能够提振意大利表现不佳的经济，但在过去四年里，它几乎没有产生什么好处。

Critics had voiced concern it would enable China to gain control of sensitive technologies and infrastructure and Italy has since taken a number of steps to veto takeovers or limit the sway of Chinese companies over their Italian counterparts.

INITIAL PREMISE

The two countries noted that they shared a common history, with Italy serving as the traditional landing place for the maritime section of the ancient Silk Route trading route linking Asia and western Europe.

PRINCIPAL OBJECTIVES

China and Italy committed to working together on strengthening their political relations and commercial ties, and promoting regional peace.

PLANNED AREAS OF COOPERATION

- Transport, logistics and infrastructure: Italy and China said they would work on projects such as roads, railways, bridges, civil aviation, ports, energy and telecommunications.翻译:- 交通、物流和基础设施：意大利和中国表示将在公路、铁路、桥梁、民航、港口、能源和电信等项目上开展合作。

- In the energy sector, State Grid Corporation of China has since 2014 owned a 35% stake in CDP Reti, a holding company that owns roughly a third of Italian power and gas grid operators Terna (TRN.MI) and Snam (SRG.MI).翻译:- 在能源领域，中国国家电网公司自2014年起持有CDP Reti 35%的股份，该控股公司拥有意大利电力和天然气电网运营商Terna (TRN.MI)和Snam (SRG.MI)约三分之一的股份） 。

- Removing obstacles to commerce and investment, promoting a partnership between their respective financial institutions.翻译:- 消除商业和投资障碍，促进各自金融机构之间的伙伴关系。

- Connectivity between people, developing a twinning network between cities and encouraging cultural, science, tourism and education exchanges.翻译:——民心相通，发展友好城市网络，鼓励文化、科技、旅游、教育交流。

- Environmental cooperation, pursuing sustainable and ecological development.翻译:——环境合作，追求可持续、生态发展。

($1 = 0.9284 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9284 欧元）

item.title: 意大利告诉中国将退出“一带一路”倡议
item.description:
Summary:
  • Italy signed pact in 2019 expecting big boost to exports
  • Hoped-for economic gains did not materialise
  • Rome says still expects good relations with Beijing
翻译:概括：
  • 意大利2019年签署协议预计出口大幅增长
  • 期望的经济收益并未实现
  • 罗马称仍期望与北京保持良好关系

Italy has officially informed China that it is quitting the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), dismissing fears the move might sour relations and damage the Italian economy, government sources said on Wednesday.翻译:政府消息人士周三表示，意大利已正式通知中国将退出“一带一路”倡议，消除了此举可能恶化关系并损害意大利经济的担忧。

Italy in 2019 became the first and so far only major Western nation to join the trade and investment programme, ignoring warnings from the United States that it might let China take control of sensitive technologies and vital infrastructure.翻译:2019年，意大利成为第一个也是迄今为止唯一一个加入该贸易和投资计划的西方主要国家，无视美国可能让中国控制敏感技术和重要基础设施的警告。

However, when Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni took office last year, she said she wanted to withdraw from the deal, which was championed by President Xi Jinping, saying it had brought no significant gains to Italy.翻译:然而，总理乔治亚·梅洛尼(Giorgia Meloni)去年上任时表示，她想退出习近平主席倡导的这项协议，称该协议没有给意大利带来任何重大收益。

The 2019 accord expires in March 2024 and an Italian government source said Rome had sent Beijing a letter "in recent days" informing China that it would not be renewing the pact.翻译:2019 年协议将于 2024 年 3 月到期，意大利政府消息人士称，罗马“最近几天”致函北京，通知中国不会续签该协议。

There was no immediate comment from China.翻译:中国没有立即发表评论。

"We have every intention of maintaining excellent relations with China even if we are no longer part of the Belt and Road Initiative," a second government source said.翻译:另一位政府消息人士表示：“即使我们不再参与‘一带一路’倡议，我们也完全愿意与中国保持良好的关系。”

"Other G7 nations have closer relations with China than we do, despite the fact they were never in (the BRI)," he added.翻译:“其他七国集团国家与中国的关系比我们更密切，尽管它们从未参与过（一带一路），”他补充道。

Italy will assume the presidency of the G7 in 2024.翻译:意大利将于2024年担任七国集团主席国。

More than 100 countries have signed agreements with China to cooperate on BRI infrastructure and building projects since the scheme was launched in 2013. The then Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte hoped for a trade bonanza when he signed up in 2019, but Chinese firms seemed to be the main beneficiaries.翻译:自2013年该计划启动以来，已有100多个国家与中国签署了“一带一路”基础设施和建筑项目合作协议。时任意大利总理朱塞佩·孔戴(Giuseppe Conte)在2019年签署协议时希望能带来贸易繁荣，但中国企业似乎主要受益者。

Italian exports to China totalled 16.4 billion euros ($17.7 billion) last year from 13 billion euros in 2019. By contrast, Chinese exports to Italy rose to 57.5 billion from 31.7 billion over the same period, according to Italian data.翻译:去年，意大利对中国的出口总额从2019年的130亿欧元增至164亿欧元（合177亿美元）。相比之下，根据意大利数据，同期中国对意大利的出口额从317亿增至575亿。

Italy's main euro zone trading partners France and Germany exported significantly more to China last year, despite not being part of the BRI, which is modelled on the old Silk Road that linked China to the West.翻译:意大利的主要欧元区贸易伙伴法国和德国去年对中国的出口大幅增加，尽管它们不是“一带一路”的一部分。“一带一路”是以连接中国与西方的古老丝绸之路为蓝本的。

Looking to maintain strategic ties, Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani visited Beijing in September and President Sergio Mattarella is due to visit China at some stage next year.翻译:为了保持战略关系，外交部长安东尼奥·塔亚尼于九月访问了北京，总统塞尔吉奥·马塔雷拉也将于明年某个阶段访问中国。

Meloni herself has said she wants to go to Beijing, but no date has been fixed.翻译:梅洛尼本人也表示她想去北京，但具体日期尚未确定。

Despite being part of the BRI, successive governments in Rome signalled their doubts about the pact by vetoing some proposed takeovers or limiting the sway of Chinese companies over their Italian counterparts.翻译:尽管是“一带一路”倡议的一部分，但罗马历届政府都通过否决一些拟议的收购或限制中国企业对意大利同行的影响力来表达对该协议的疑虑。

In June, Meloni's cabinet curbed the influence of Chinese shareholder Sinochem (600500.SS) on Italian tyremaker Pirelli, using "golden power" rules designed to protect strategic assets.翻译:6月，梅洛尼内阁利用旨在保护战略资产的“黄金权力”规则， 遏制了中国股东中化集团（600500.SS）对意大利轮胎制造商倍耐力的影响。

Meloni, who heads a conservative coalition, has been keen to burnish her credentials as a committed pro-NATO leader and a government source said that she had assured U.S. President Joe Biden earlier this year that Italy would quit the BRI.翻译:领导保守派联盟的梅洛尼一直热衷于提升自己作为坚定的亲北约领导人的信誉，一位政府消息人士称，她今年早些时候已向美国总统乔·拜登保证，意大利将退出“一带一路”倡议。

Reporting by Angelo Amante, Crispian Balmer and Giuseppe Fonte, writing by Giulia Segreti and Crispian Balmer Editing by Keith Weir and Toby Chopra翻译:报道：Angelo Amante、Crispian Balmer 和 Giuseppe Fonte，撰文：Giulia Segreti 和 Crispian Balmer 编辑：Keith Weir 和 Toby Chopra

item.title: “精灵酒吧”背后的中国电子烟巨头向美国非法电子烟泛滥
item.description:
A new breed of e-cigarette has addicted teenagers and confounded regulators worldwide by offering flavors like Blue Cotton Candy and Pink Lemonade in a cheap, disposable package.翻译:一种新型电子烟在廉价的一次性包装中提供蓝色棉花糖和粉色柠檬水等口味，让青少年上瘾，并让世界各地的监管机构感到困惑。

The tycoon dominating this latest wave is Zhang Shengwei, 50, a veteran of China’s vape industry in the southern manufacturing hub of Shenzhen.翻译:主导这一最新浪潮的大亨是 50 岁的张胜伟，他是中国南部制造业中心深圳的电子烟行业资深人士。

Most people have never heard of him. Zhang quietly rose over 15 years from a boutique exporter to become one of the world’s largest vape manufacturers. His main company, Heaven Gifts, now competes with industry giants Juul Labs Inc and British American Tobacco Plc (BATS.L) in the United States, the United Kingdom and across Europe.翻译:大多数人从未听说过他。 15年来，张先生从一家精品出口商悄然崛起，成为全球最大的电子烟制造商之一。他的主要公司 Heaven Gifts 目前在美国、英国和整个欧洲与行业巨头 Juul Labs Inc 和英美烟草公司(BATS.L)竞争。

Zhang has navigated shifting regulations in countries cracking down on candy-flavored vapes, which many health advocates say are designed to hook teenagers. In the United States, the firm simply ignored regulations on new products and capitalized on poor enforcement. It has flooded the U.S. market with flavored vapes that have been among the best-selling U.S. brands, including Elf Bar, EBDesign and Lost Mary. In the United Kingdom, by contrast, Zhang has complied with regulations requiring lower nicotine levels and government registration while building an unmatched distribution network — and driving a surge in youth vaping.翻译:张曾应对各国打击糖果味电子烟的不断变化的法规，许多健康倡导者表示，糖果味电子烟的目的是为了吸引青少年。在美国，该公司根本无视新产品的法规，并利用执法不力。该公司的调味电子烟充斥美国市场，其中包括 Elf Bar、EBDesign 和 Lost Mary，这些电子烟一直是美国最畅销的品牌之一。相比之下，在英国，张先生遵守了要求降低尼古丁含量和政府注册的法规，同时建立了无与伦比的分销网络，并推动了青少年电子烟数量的激增。

In China — where more than 90% of the world’s vaping devices are manufactured — Zhang steered clear of domestic sales, resisting the temptation of a gargantuan market with 300 million smokers who might be converted to vaping. His focus on exports looked prescient when Beijing last year banned all domestic sales of flavored vapes, crushing some of Zhang’s competitors that had bet heavily on the China market.翻译:在中国——世界上90%以上的电子烟设备都是在中国生产的——张先生避开了国内销售，抵制了可能有3亿烟民转向电子烟的庞大市场的诱惑。当北京去年禁止调味电子烟的所有国内销售时，他对出口的关注看起来很有先见之明，压垮了张的一些在中国市场大举押注的竞争对手。

Zhang, who also does business under the corporate name Shenzhen IMiracle Technology, declined requests for an interview. A Heaven Gifts spokesperson, Jacques Li, said the company does not market to children and takes youth-vaping concerns seriously. He acknowledged the company’s flavors could attract teens but said the company is modifying its packaging to be less appealing to youth and discontinuing some flavors, such as “rainbow candy.”翻译:张也以深圳 IMiracle Technology 名义开展业务，他拒绝接受采访。 Heaven Gifts 发言人雅克·李 (Jacques Li) 表示，该公司不向儿童推销产品，并严肃对待青少年吸电子烟的问题。他承认该公司的口味可能会吸引青少年，但表示该公司正在修改其包装，以减少对年轻人的吸引力，并停止某些口味，例如“彩虹糖”。

Flavored vapes are more effective in helping smokers quit than those that mimic cigarettes, he said.翻译:他说，调味电子烟比那些模仿香烟的电子烟更能有效地帮助吸烟者戒烟。

“Adults like flavors, too,” Li said. “Flavored e-cigarettes shouldn’t be demonized. They’re not evil.”翻译:“成年人也喜欢口味，”李说。 “调味电子烟不应该被妖魔化。他们并不邪恶。”

Zhang’s deft maneuvering illustrates the difficulty of curtailing youth vaping despite a global effort to halt a new wave of teenage nicotine addiction. It also highlights how China’s domestic candy-vape crackdown is proving to be a rare success — even as its homegrown e-cigarette industry continues to dominate manufacturing and exports.翻译:张的灵巧的操作说明了尽管全球努力阻止新一波青少年尼古丁成瘾，但减少青少年吸电子烟仍然困难重重。它还凸显了中国国内的糖果电子烟打击行动取得了罕见的成功——尽管其本土电子烟行业继续主导着制造和出口。

China’s enforcement wins owe to its communist government’s greater power over companies and willingness to levy stiff penalties. Chinese state media has trumpeted crackdowns including a March raid on a nationwide distribution network, in which authorities seized e-cigarette inventory valued at 150 million yuan ($21 million USD) and arrested 10 people. Sales of vapes, now permitted only in unpopular tobacco flavors, plummeted from $2.9 billion in 2021 to $1.7 billion in China last year, according to market research firm Euromonitor International. Sales are predicted to fall much further this year.翻译:中国的执法胜利归功于其共产党政府对企业的更大权力以及征收严厉处罚的意愿。中国官方媒体大肆宣扬打击行动，其中包括 3 月份对全国分销网络进行的突袭，当局查获了价值 1.5 亿元人民币（2100 万美元）的电子烟库存，并逮捕了 10 人。根据市场研究公司 Euromonitor International 的数据，目前仅允许以不受欢迎的烟草口味销售的电子烟在中国的销售额从 2021 年的 29 亿美元骤降至去年的 17 亿美元。预计今年的销售额将进一步下降。

In banning flavors, China cites the same health concerns with youth vaping as other governments. But Beijing has a unique conflict of interest in the crackdown: It also runs a state cigarette monopoly, which accounts for 8.7% of China’s tax revenue and directly benefits from strict e-cigarette regulation. China National Tobacco Corp, according to Euromonitor, last year sold more than 2.4 trillion cigarettes, nearly four times as many as U.S.-based tobacco giant Philip Morris International reported selling last year.翻译:在禁止口味方面，中国与其他国家政府一样，也提到了青少年吸电子烟的健康问题。但北京在打击行动中存在独特的利益冲突：它还经营着国家卷烟专卖店，占中国税收收入的8.7%，并直接受益于严格的电子烟监管。 Euromonitor 的数据显示，中国烟草总公司去年销售了超过 2.4 万亿支卷烟，几乎是美国烟草巨头菲利普莫里斯国际公司去年报告的销售量的四倍。

“Everything about the regulations is about protecting cigarettes,” said Geoff Fong, founder of the International Tobacco Control Policy Evaluation Project at Canada’s University of Waterloo, which evaluates the impact of tobacco regulation across 31 countries.翻译:“有关法规的一切都是为了保护卷烟，”加拿大滑铁卢大学国际烟草控制政策评估项目的创始人 Geoff Fong 说，该项目评估了 31 个国家烟草监管的影响。

China National Tobacco and the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration, which regulates cigarettes and e-cigarettes, did not comment.翻译:中国国家烟草总局和负责监管卷烟和电子烟的国家烟草专卖局没有发表评论。

As China cracks down on e-cigarettes at home, it continues to help vape manufacturers including Heaven Gifts export millions of candy-flavored vapes. With the domestic flavor ban, China also levied new taxes on e-cigarette manufacturers, importers and domestic distributors. But those taxes don’t apply to e-cigarette manufacturers targeting overseas markets. Authorities also smoothed the way last year for overseas shipping by “white-listing” Heaven Gifts and many other Chinese vaping companies at Shenzhen’s airport, requiring fewer export inspections, according to Heaven Gifts and a post last year from China’s e-cigarette association.翻译:随着中国在国内打击电子烟，它继续帮助包括Heaven Gifts在内的电子烟制造商出口数百万支糖果味电子烟。随着国产香精禁令的实施，中国还对电子烟制造商、进口商和国内经销商征收新税。但这些税收不适用于瞄准海外市场的电子烟制造商。根据Heaven Gifts和中国电子烟协会去年发布的帖子，当局去年还通过在深圳机场将Heaven Gifts和许多其他中国电子烟公司列入“白名单”，减少了出口检查，为海外运输铺平了道路。

In the wake of China’s domestic flavored-vape ban, the value of the nation’s exports of e-cigarettes and related products jumped 29.9% to $5.48 billion in the first half of 2023 from the same period a year earlier, according to data from China’s General Administration of Customs.翻译:中国总局的数据显示，在中国国内调味电子烟禁令实施后，2023年上半年，中国电子烟及相关产品出口额同比增长29.9%，达到54.8亿美元。海关管理。

The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA), by contrast, has had little success curtailing flavored e-cigarettes under restrictions implemented since 2020 amid public outrage over youth vaping. Heaven Gifts and many other China-based manufacturers are selling millions of vapes in the United States without getting FDA authorization for their products, which is required of any foreign or domestic e-cigarette purveyor.翻译:相比之下，由于公众对青少年吸电子烟的愤怒，美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 自 2020 年以来实施的限制措施在限制调味电子烟方面收效甚微。 Heaven Gifts 和许多其他中国制造商在美国销售数百万支电子烟，但其产品并未获得 FDA 授权，而这是任何外国或国内电子烟供应商都需要获得 FDA 授权的。

By moving forward with illegal sales, the Chinese firms are grabbing market share from companies trying to comply with the FDA’s lengthy and expensive approval requirements. The FDA requires extensive studies to prove any vaping product is a net benefit to public health by helping adults quit smoking without addicting new users to nicotine.翻译:通过推进非法销售，中国公司正在从那些试图遵守 FDA 漫长而昂贵的审批要求的公司手中夺取市场份额。 FDA 要求进行广泛的研究，以证明任何电子烟产品都可以帮助成年人戒烟而不会让新使用者对尼古丁上瘾，从而对公共健康产生净效益。

Brian King, who heads FDA’s Center for Tobacco Products, which regulates e-cigarettes, said in an interview the agency can’t levy penalties or file lawsuits against foreign companies. The FDA, he said, also lacks enough enforcement resources to stem the tide of cheap Chinese vapes once they reach U.S. shores. Asked what he knows about Zhang, King declined to comment on any individual or company but said the agency is “obviously aware of the Elf Bar product.”翻译:FDA 负责监管电子烟的烟草产品中心负责人布莱恩·金 (Brian King) 在接受采访时表示，该机构不能对外国公司实施处罚或提起诉讼。他说，FDA 也缺乏足够的执法资源来阻止廉价中国电子烟到达美国海岸后的浪潮。当被问及对张的了解时，金拒绝对任何个人或公司发表评论，但表示该机构“显然了解 Elf Bar 产品”。

In a statement, British American Tobacco called on the FDA and law enforcement to crack down on illegal products from Heaven Gifts and others that have “overrun” the U.S. market. These manufacturers, it said, are “flagrantly violating virtually every rule and guidance FDA has issued. These products continue to pour across our borders and target youth.”翻译:英美烟草公司在一份声明中呼吁 FDA 和执法部门严厉打击来自 Heaven Gifts 和其他“占领”美国市场的非法产品。报告称，这些制造商“公然违反了 FDA 发布的几乎所有规则和指南。这些产品继续涌入我们的国界并瞄准年轻人。”

Juul said in a statement that “inadequate enforcement” against illicit disposable products “undermines FDA’s ability to oversee a properly regulated marketplace.”翻译:Juul 在一份声明中表示，针对非法一次性产品的“执法不力”“削弱了 FDA 监督适当监管市场的能力”。

Company spokesman Li said Heaven Gifts is “trying our best to stay compliant in the U.S.” but did not answer questions about whether the company had filed required FDA applications. He called the FDA rules incoherent and unclear as to “what standards you have to meet,” without citing specifics.翻译:公司发言人李表示，Heaven Gifts 正在“尽力保持在美国的合规性”，但没有回答有关该公司是否已提交 FDA 所需申请的问题。他称 FDA 的规定不连贯且不清楚“必须满足哪些标准”，但没有引用具体细节。

The FDA had no comment on Li’s critique.翻译:FDA 对李的批评没有发表评论。

U.S. youth vaping rates have dropped significantly since the coronavirus pandemic. But Elf Bar has quickly grown into the most popular product among teens. A June study released by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) found that Elf Bar was the number one U.S. disposable e-cigarette brand in December 2022, about a year after it went on sale. A separate national survey of youth tobacco use released last month by the CDC and FDA found Elf Bar was the brand of choice for 56.7% of middle- and high-school vapers.翻译:自冠状病毒大流行以来，美国青少年的电子烟使用率大幅下降。但 Elf Bar 已迅速成长为最受青少年欢迎的产品。美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 6 月份发布的一项研究发现，Elf Bar 在 2022 年 12 月（即上市大约一年后）成为美国排名第一的一次性电子烟品牌。美国疾病控制和预防中心 (CDC) 和 FDA 上个月发布的另一项针对青少年烟草使用情况的全国调查发现，Elf Bar 是 56.7% 的初中和高中电子烟使用者的首选品牌。

Matthew Myers, who recently retired as president of advocacy group Campaign for Tobacco-Free Kids, said the government’s failure to enforce the law is allowing companies like Heaven Gifts to make "massive profits," while putting "anybody who tries to do the right thing” at a disadvantage.翻译:马修·迈尔斯 (Matthew Myers) 最近退休，担任无烟儿童倡导组织主席，他表示，政府未能执行法律，导致像 Heaven Gifts 这样的公司能够赚取“巨额利润”，同时却让“任何试图做正确事情的人”陷入困境。 ” 处于劣势。

The open sale of products without FDA authorization “is about the most blatant thing that I’ve seen,” said Myers, who worked for four decades as a tobacco regulator and anti-smoking advocate. “What you’ve got is a guy who’s thumbing his nose at the United States government.”翻译:未经 FDA 授权公开销售产品“是我见过的最明目张胆的事情”，迈尔斯说。他曾担任烟草监管者和反吸烟倡导者长达四十年之久。 “你所面对的是一个对美国政府嗤之以鼻的人。”

Li said in a statement Tuesday that the company was “working with regulators in the U.S. to solve the issue,” without elaborating on those communications. The FDA did not immediately comment on whether it has interacted with the company.

WINNERS AND LOSERS

Zhang’s meteoric rise has left a trail of damaged competitors who responded differently to the global regulation wave.翻译:张的迅速崛起留下了一系列受损的竞争对手，他们对全球监管浪潮做出了不同的反应。

Beijing-based RLX Technology (RLX.N), founded in 2018, made the opposite moves: Betting big on the Chinese market and complying with new U.S. regulations.翻译:总部位于北京的RLX Technology (RLX.N)成立于2018年，却采取了相反的举措：大举押注中国市场并遵守美国新法规。

The company was valued at nearly $35 billion in a January 2021 initial public offering on the New York Stock Exchange. Now, after the Beijing ban, it’s worth $3.3 billion.翻译:该公司于 2021 年 1 月在纽约证券交易所首次公开募股，估值近 350 亿美元。现在，在北京实施禁令之后，它的价值已达 33 亿美元。

In the United States, RLX has been mired in regulatory approval processes. It has spent millions on extensive FDA-required studies since 2020 but still awaits an agency decision. RLX declined to comment for this report.翻译:在美国，RLX 一直深陷监管审批流程。自 2020 年以来，该公司已花费数百万美元进行 FDA 要求的广泛研究，但仍在等待机构决定。 RLX 拒绝对此报道发表评论。

Heaven Gifts and others have thrived by disregarding U.S. regulations. Zhang’s fruity vapes racked up more than $650 million in U.S. sales over the year ending in mid-October 2023, according to private retail data from Circana, a Chicago market research firm formerly known as IRI. The data, which measures purchases from January 2018 through mid-October of this year, was shared with Reuters by a person outside Circana who asked not to be identified.翻译:Heaven Gifts 和其他公司通过无视美国法规而蓬勃发展。根据芝加哥市场研究公司 Circana（前身为 IRI）的私人零售数据，截至 2023 年 10 月中旬的一年里，张的果味电子烟在美国的销售额超过 6.5 亿美元。 Circana 外部一位不愿透露姓名的人士向路透社分享了这些数据，统计了 2018 年 1 月至今年 10 月中旬的购买情况。

Heaven Gifts sales for the year ending September 2023 represent more than 9% of the U.S. e-cigarette market, according to the data. That put Zhang’s disposable brands behind only the Vuse Alto, made by British American Tobacco, and Juul, in market share.翻译:数据显示，截至 2023 年 9 月的一年，Heaven Gifts 的销售额占美国电子烟市场的 9% 以上。这使得张的一次性品牌的市场份额仅次于英美烟草公司生产的 Vuse Alto 和 Juul。

In May, more than a year after Heaven Gifts started flooding U.S. stores, the FDA took aim at Elf Bar by sending alerts to customs officials instructing them to stop shipments of the company’s products. Li said that none of the company’s shipments have been “seized or sent back.”翻译:今年5月，在Heaven Gifts开始涌入美国商店一年多后，FDA将目标瞄准了Elf Bar，向海关官员发出警报，指示他们停止运送该公司的产品。李说，该公司的货物都没有被“扣押或退回”。

A Reuters review of a FDA database listing shipments blocked at the ports showed that FDA and customs officials, on November 6, stopped an unspecified amount of products from a Zhang company from entering the United States. FDA and customs officials did not comment about the detained products.翻译:路透社对列出港口被拦截货物的 FDA 数据库进行的审查显示，FDA 和海关官员于 11 月 6 日阻止了某张公司的数量不详的产品进入美国。 FDA 和海关官员没有对被扣留的产品发表评论。

Li said the firm has stopped shipping e-cigarettes under the Elf Bar and EBDesign brands, which were named in the May import alert. Li did not address whether the company has halted shipments under other product names, such as Lost Mary. He said “we don’t think we are still a leading brand” in the United States, and the company believes counterfeit versions of its products are “rampant.”翻译:李表示，该公司已停止销售 Elf Bar 和 EBDesign 品牌的电子烟，这些品牌均在 5 月份的进口警报中被点名。李没有透露该公司是否已停止以“Lost Mary”等其他产品名称发货。他表示，“我们认为我们在美国仍然不是领先品牌”，而且该公司认为其产品的假冒版本“猖獗”。

The FDA said it is still assessing information on detained imports but that such data can’t capture the “true impact” of its alerts. The agency said it believes the alerts likely cause “countless firms” to voluntarily stop importing illegal e-cigarettes.翻译:FDA 表示，仍在评估有关被扣押进口产品的信息，但此类数据无法反映其警报的“真正影响”。该机构表示，相信这些警报可能会导致“无数公司”自愿停止进口非法电子烟。

Five current and former executives in the Chinese vaping industry told Reuters that Heaven Gifts’ flouting of FDA rules follows a common playbook across China’s e-cigarette industry. Following the rules, they said, costs companies millions of dollars in compliance expenses and lost profits while competitors enter the U.S. market illegally with little or no consequences.翻译:中国电子烟行业的五名现任和前任高管告诉路透社，Heaven Gifts 藐视 FDA 规则的行为遵循了整个中国电子烟行业的共同做法。他们表示，遵守规则会让公司损失数百万美元的合规费用并损失利润，而竞争对手非法进入美国市场却几乎没有后果。

Elf Bar and other Heaven Gifts brands remained the market leader in disposable e-cigarettes in the quarter ending in September, according to the Circana data.翻译:根据 Circana 的数据，在截至 9 月份的季度中，Elf Bar 和其他 Heaven Gifts 品牌仍然是一次性电子烟的市场领导者。

The FDA’s King said the agency acted on Elf Bar once it had data showing that the product was a top seller and popular among youth. He said it takes time to build enforcement cases against U.S. based suppliers or retailers selling illegal vapes.翻译:FDA 的 King 表示，一旦有数据显示该产品最畅销并深受年轻人欢迎，该机构就对 Elf Bar 采取了行动。他表示，针对销售非法电子烟的美国供应商或零售商建立执法案件需要时间。

“We can't be everywhere at every time,” King said. “So I've got to prioritize the resources we do have.”翻译:“我们不可能每时每刻都在，”金说。 “所以我必须优先考虑我们现有的资源。”

The agency has relatively little money to pursue e-cigarette companies, King said, because it does not assess fees on the industry for that purpose. It’s now seeking the authority from Congress to do so. Enforcement is also slowed by the need to consult with the U.S. Justice Department before suing violators, King said, and an agency practice of sending distributors and retailers warnings before taking action.翻译:金表示，该机构用于追查电子烟公司的资金相对较少，因为它不会为此目的对该行业进行收费。它现在正在寻求国会的授权来这样做。金表示，在起诉违法者之前需要咨询美国司法部，而且该机构在采取行动之前向分销商和零售商发出警告的做法也导致了执法速度的放缓。

After sending warning letters beginning in June to more than 300 retailers selling Elf Bar, the agency has since fined more than 60 businesses, many of them gas stations and convenience stores.

MEET ‘WAYNE’

Disposable vapes such as the Elf Bar typically contain much higher volumes of nicotine liquid than earlier versions of e-cigarettes, including those from Juul. And they’re easier to use: Just open the box and start puffing.翻译:Elf Bar 等一次性电子烟的尼古丁液含量通常比早期版本的电子烟（包括 Juul 的电子烟）高得多。而且它们更易于使用：只需打开盒子即可开始吸食。

Before the 2020 U.S. rules, Juul dominated the U.S. vaping market with a device using “pods” of nicotine liquid in an array of flavors that were a hit with teenagers, making the company the prime target of public outrage.翻译:在 2020 年美国规则出台之前，Juul 凭借一款使用多种口味的尼古丁液体“烟弹”的设备主导了美国电子烟市场，该设备深受青少年欢迎，使该公司成为公众愤怒的首要目标。

A Juul pod has about 200 puffs; some Heaven Gifts vapes offer up to 5,000 drags. A Juul starter kit costs at least $40 for a charger, device and pack of four pods. Zhang’s devices commonly sell for about $20.翻译:一个 Juul 烟弹大约可吸 200 口；有些 Heaven Gifts 电子烟的吸量高达 5,000 口。 Juul 入门套件包含充电器、设备和四个烟弹套装，售价至少为 40 美元。张的设备通常售价约为 20 美元。

Juul pulled popular flavors such as Mango ahead of the 2020 FDA restrictions, which prohibited flavors in pod-based devices. Heaven Gifts has offered Lemon Drop, Strawberry Piña Colada and Tropical Rainbow Blast, among many others.翻译:Juul 在 2020 年 FDA 限制措施出台之前撤下了芒果等流行口味，该限制禁止在基于烟弹的设备中使用口味。 Heaven Gifts 提供柠檬糖、草莓冰镇果汁朗姆酒和热带彩虹爆炸等产品。

Sales of disposable vapes including the Elf Bar have exploded because users consider them a good value, said Becky Freeman, an associate public-health professor at the University of Sydney in Australia, which has also seen a sharp rise in unauthorized e-cigarettes, many from China, and youth use.翻译:澳大利亚悉尼大学公共卫生副教授贝基·弗里曼 (Becky Freeman) 表示，包括 Elf Bar 在内的一次性电子烟销量呈爆炸式增长，因为用户认为它们物有所值，而且未经授权的电子烟也急剧增加。来自中国，青少年使用。

“If you’re a group of kids, you pitch in some money, and you share it,” Freeman said. “It’s the right product, the right price, and you can get it in all these flavors.”翻译:“如果你们是一群孩子，你们就会投入一些钱，然后大家分享，”弗里曼说。 “这是合适的产品，合适的价格，而且您可以买到所有这些口味。”

Five years ago, Heaven Gifts made no products of its own, operating as an exporter and distributor of other Chinese-made vaping products, such as the Suorin and Smok brands. Zhang originally exported vaping products made by the Chinese company Ruyan, which is credited with inventing the modern e-cigarette.翻译:五年前，Heaven Gifts 还没有生产自己的产品，而是作为 Suorin 和 Smok 品牌等其他中国制造的电子烟产品的出口商和经销商。张最初出口的是中国公司如烟生产的电子烟产品，该公司被誉为现代电子烟的发明者。

In the industry’s early days, in the late 2000s, Zhang was widely known as “Wayne” on online vaping forums. He started the company in a Shanghai apartment with five other staffers, said company spokesperson Li. Zhang used the bathroom as his office, he said. Heaven Gifts was founded in 2007, Li said. The name evoked the notion that vaping offers a miracle cure for the afflictions of tobacco cigarettes.翻译:在该行业的早期，即 2000 年代末，张在在线电子烟论坛上被广泛称为“Wayne”。公司发言人李说，他与其他五名员工在上海的一间公寓里创办了这家公司。张说，他把浴室当作办公室。李说，Heaven Gifts成立于2007年。这个名字让人联想到电子烟是治疗烟草带来的痛苦的灵丹妙药。

Trading companies like Zhang’s targeted mom-and-pop vape stores and regional distributors who couldn’t afford to buy the large minimum orders demanded by manufacturers in Shenzhen’s “Vape Valley.”翻译:像张这样的贸易公司的目标是夫妻电子烟商店和区域经销商，他们无法购买深圳“电子烟谷”制造商所要求的大量最低订单。

Heaven Gifts moved from Shanghai to Shenzhen in 2014 in a bid to make its own product. Early efforts failed, said Oliver Kershaw, founder of e-cigarette-forum.com, a popular hub for industry players and vaping enthusiasts. But Heaven Gifts excelled in cultivating ties with distributors, particularly in the UK.翻译:2014年，Heaven Gifts从上海搬到了深圳，以生产自己的产品。电子烟论坛.com 的创始人奥利弗·克肖 (Oliver Kershaw) 表示，早期的努力失败了，该网站是行业参与者和电子烟爱好者的热门中心。但 Heaven Gifts 在与经销商建立联系方面表现出色，尤其是在英国。

In 2019, still determined to manufacture his own e-cigarettes, Zhang started investing heavily across the production chain. Heaven Gifts took a 14.6% stake in manufacturer Shenzhen Youme Technology, the maker of Suorin vaping products, according to Chinese corporate data website Tianyancha. Shenzhen Youme did not comment.翻译:2019年，张先生仍然决心制造自己的电子烟，他开始在整个生产链上进行大规模投资。根据中国企业数据网站天眼查的数据，Heaven Gifts 收购了 Suorin 电子烟产品制造商深圳优美科技 14.6% 的股份。深圳优美未发表评论。

Zhang also invested in makers of batteries, heating chips, nicotine liquid, and a highly automated vape factory in the nearby city of Zhuhai. Li said such investments were “very important” strategic moves for Heaven Gifts.翻译:张还投资了电池、加热芯片、尼古丁液制造商，以及附近城市珠海的一家高度自动化的电子烟工厂。李表示，此类投资对Heaven Gifts来说是“非常重要”的战略举措。

Li said the company launched the Elf Bar first in the UK, in 2021, and later that year in the United States. Heaven Gifts has grown from 200 staff around a year ago to more than 700 today, Li said. At a time when many Chinese graduates struggle to find jobs, the company presents itself as friendly and international, with promotional videos showing 20-something staffers fistbumping and clinking bubbleteas in a bright modern space.翻译:李表示，该公司于 2021 年首先在英国推出了 Elf Bar，随后又在美国推出了 Elf Bar。李说，Heaven Gifts 的员工人数已从大约一年前的 200 名增加到今天的 700 多名。在许多中国毕业生难以找到工作的时候，该公司却以友好和国际化的形象展现自己，其宣传视频显示，20 多岁的员工在明亮的现代空间中击拳、碰杯珍珠奶茶。

Two people who work with Zhang describe him as low key. He dresses simply, despite his newfound riches, in jeans and collared shirts. He’s a hands-on manager with sales, research and strategy teams but keeps relatively quiet in meetings.翻译:与张共事的两个人都形容他为人低调。尽管他新获得了财富，但他的穿着很简单，穿着牛仔裤和有领衬衫。他是销售、研究和战略团队的一位亲力亲为的经理，但在会议上却相对安静。

He still goes by Wayne, Li said.

SPARKING A UK YOUTH-VAPING BOOM

Before launching the Elf Bar, Heaven Gifts established a distribution beachhead in the UK. While operating as a middleman, moving products from China’s Vape Valley through local distributors, Zhang also set up his own branded website called Deepvaping to sell directly to consumers and retailers.翻译:在推出 Elf Bar 之前，Heaven Gifts 在英国建立了分销滩头阵地。在作为中间商运营，通过当地经销商从中国电子烟谷运输产品的同时，张还建立了自己的品牌网站“Deepvaping”，直接向消费​​者和零售商销售产品。

The UK offered a more permissive regulatory environment. As the United States debated banning flavors, the UK allowed them, while setting limits on nicotine levels and requiring vape companies to register with regulators. Heaven Gifts says it abided by the UK rules.翻译:英国提供了更加宽松的监管环境。当美国就禁止口味展开辩论时，英国却允许了，同时对尼古丁含量设定了限制，并要求电子烟公司向监管机构注册。 Heaven Gifts 表示，它遵守英国的规定。

U.S. youth vaping surged with the rise of Juul in 2018 and 2019, but it was more controlled in the UK until the introduction of the Elf Bar and similar flavored disposables. Then it jumped: A survey released in June by Action on Smoking and Health (ASH), a British public-health organization, found that more than 20% of children aged 11 to 17 had tried vaping by 2023, up from about 14% in 2020. The increase, the survey found, was driven overwhelmingly by disposables, the Elf Bar being the most popular.翻译:2018 年和 2019 年，随着 Juul 的崛起，美国青少年电子烟数量激增，但在英国，电子烟受到更多控制，直到 Elf Bar 和类似口味的一次性电子烟推出。随后，这一数字跃升：英国公共卫生组织吸烟与健康行动组织 (ASH) 6 月发布的一项调查发现，到 2023 年，超过 20% 的 11 至 17 岁儿童尝试过吸电子烟，而 2023 年这一比例约为 14%。 2020 年。调查发现，这一增长主要是由一次性用品推动的，其中 Elf Bar 最受欢迎。

Hazel Cheeseman, deputy chief executive of ASH, said disposable-vape manufacturers such as Heaven Gifts “have not been taking remotely seriously that their products are so appealing and so widely used by under-18s.”翻译:ASH 副首席执行官 Hazel Cheeseman 表示，Heaven Gifts 等一次性电子烟制造商“并没有认真对待他们的产品如此吸引人并被 18 岁以下青少年广泛使用”。

The UK and the European Union both have regulations restricting nicotine levels, which means the amount of nicotine in a European Elf Bar isn’t enough to satisfy most cigarette smokers trying to quit, said Kershaw, the e-cigarette-forum.com founder. But it’s enough to lure nonsmokers and potentially addict them.翻译:e-香烟论坛.com 创始人 Kershaw 表示，英国和欧盟都有限制尼古丁含量的法规，这意味着欧洲精灵棒中的尼古丁含量不足以满足大多数试图戒烟的吸烟者的需求。但这足以吸引不吸烟者并可能使他们上瘾。

In July, consumer-products and vaping wholesaler Supreme Plc announced a deal to supply Elf Bar and Lost Mary to several major British supermarket and convenience store chains. Supreme says on its Elf Bar product webpage that about 2.5 million of them are sold weekly in the UK. Supreme did not answer questions about public-health advocates’ concerns with the products, but said the company expects to generate 40 million pounds ($50.4 million USD) in revenue from the products for the year ending in March 2024.翻译:7 月，消费品和电子烟批发商 Supreme Plc 宣布达成一项协议，向英国几家大型超市和便利店连锁店供应 Elf Bar 和 Lost Mary。 Supreme 在其 Elf Bar 产品网页上表示，英国每周售出约 250 万件。 Supreme 没有回答有关公共卫生倡导者对这些产品的担忧的问题，但表示该公司预计在截至 2024 年 3 月的财年中，这些产品将带来 4000 万英镑（5040 万美元）的收入。

Elf Bar and other flavored e-cigarettes are illegal in some parts of Europe, including Hungary, where local laws are more restrictive than EU tobacco regulations.翻译:Elf Bar 和其他调味电子烟在欧洲某些地区是非法的，包括匈牙利，当地法律比欧盟烟草法规更严格。

Hungary has battled a surge of illegal disposable vapes for more than a year, according to Tibor Demjen, who leads Hungary’s anti-tobacco efforts. The government has slowed sales but not stopped them, he said. He accused the disposable purveyors of trying to “infiltrate the young population with nicotine.”翻译:匈牙利反烟草工作负责人蒂博尔·德姆詹 (Tibor Demjen) 表示，一年多来，匈牙利一直在与非法一次性电子烟的激增作斗争。他说，政府已经放慢了销售速度，但并没有阻止销售。他指责一次性产品供应商试图“向年轻人渗透尼古丁”。

“It’s their job,” Demjen said, “and they do it well.”翻译:“这是他们的工作，”德姆詹说，“而且他们做得很好。”

Heaven Gifts spokesperson Li said the company is “paying great attention” to the issue and blamed illegal smuggling of products meant for other markets into Hungary.

BOTCHED CRACKDOWN

When the U.S. FDA tightened e-cigarette rules in 2020, it made what public health groups would call a monumental blunder that supercharged production of disposables in flavors appealing to teenagers.翻译:当美国 FDA 在 2020 年收紧电子烟法规时，它犯了公共卫生组织所说的一个巨大错误，导致了对青少年口味有吸引力的一次性电子烟的生产量激增。

In the year before the implementation of those rules, Juul dominated the market with its flavored pods, the favorite among teens. The FDA outlawed sweet flavors in pod-based devices — but exempted other device types, including disposables. The agency said it didn’t want to restrict options for adults who might use other kinds of e-cigarettes to quit smoking. All companies would still need FDA authorization to sell specific products.翻译:在这些规则实施的前一年，Juul 以其深受青少年喜爱的调味烟弹主导了市场。 FDA 禁止在基于豆荚的设备中使用甜味剂，但豁免其他类型的设备，包括一次性设备。该机构表示，它不想限制可能使用其他类型电子烟戒烟的成年人的选择。所有公司仍需要 FDA 授权才能销售特定产品。

The result: The industry shifted en masse toward producing candy-flavored disposables for the U.S. market.翻译:结果：该行业集体转向为美国市场生产糖果味一次性用品。

Juul pulled all flavors except tobacco and menthol by late 2019, ahead of the FDA’s 2020 flavor restrictions. The firm’s market share, according to the Circana retail data, fell from a peak of 71% in the fourth quarter of 2018 to 21% in the third quarter of 2023. Flavored disposable brands like those made by Heaven Gifts climbed from 4% of the market to 43% over the same period, the data show.翻译:在 FDA 2020 年口味限制之前，Juul 于 2019 年底取消了除烟草和薄荷醇以外的所有口味。根据 Circana 零售数据，该公司的市场份额从 2018 年第四季度 71% 的峰值下降到 2023 年第三季度的 21%。Heaven Gifts 等一次性调味品牌的市场份额从 4% 攀升至 2023 年第三季度。数据显示，同期市场增长率为43%。

Mitch Zeller, who retired as the head of FDA’s tobacco division last year, told Reuters that he was informed in December 2019 by FDA’s chief of staff, Keagan Lenihan, that the White House wanted flavor restrictions only on pod-style e-cigarettes. In September of that year, then-President Donald Trump had announced plans to ban all e-cigarette flavors except tobacco because of their popularity among teenagers, a move that sparked blowback from the industry and adult vapers.翻译:去年退休的 FDA 烟草部门负责人 Mitch Zeller 告诉路透社， FDA 办公厅主任 Keagan Lenihan 于 2019 年 12 月通知他，白宫希望仅对烟弹式电子烟进行口味限制。同年 9 月，时任总统唐纳德·特朗普宣布计划禁止除烟草以外的所有电子烟口味，因为它们在青少年中很受欢迎，此举引发了行业和成年电子烟爱好者的强烈反对。

Zeller said he told Lenihan teenagers would just switch to flavored disposables, and that the FDA needed to push back on the White House. “I was hugely concerned that this policy was drawing a line in the wrong place,” said Zeller, who now advises a pharmaceutical company developing smoking-cessation drugs.翻译:泽勒说，他告诉雷尼汉青少年只会改用有味道的一次性用品，而 FDA 需要阻止白宫。 “我非常担心这项政策划错了界限，”泽勒说，他现在为一家开发戒烟药物的制药公司提供咨询。

Lenihan said the White House’s decision was final, according to Zeller. Lenihan, who now works as an external-affairs executive for Philip Morris International, did not comment. A Trump spokesperson also had no comment.翻译:泽勒表示，勒尼汉表示白宫的决定是最终决定。现任菲利普莫里斯国际公司对外事务主管的勒尼汉没有发表评论。特朗普发言人也没有发表评论。

In a statement to Reuters, the FDA said data in 2020 showed teens “overwhelmingly preferred” cartridge e-cigarettes like Juul, and that the agency “has the ability to shift enforcement priorities based on new data and information.”翻译:FDA 在给路透社的一份声明中表示，2020 年的数据显示青少年“压倒性地喜欢”像 Juul 这样的烟弹电子烟，并且该机构“有能力根据新数据和信息改变执法重点”。

The bigger problem for the FDA: Its approval process is considered so onerous that many e-cigarette manufacturers just skip it, even though sweet flavors remain potentially legal in disposable vapes.翻译:FDA 面临的更大问题是：其审批程序被认为非常繁琐，以至于许多电子烟制造商直接跳过它，尽管一次性电子烟中的甜味仍然可能是合法的。

On paper, U.S. e-cigarette regulations are far stricter than those in Europe and the UK, requiring companies to prove a net benefit to public health. To date, the agency has only granted authorizations to 23 vaping products, all of them tobacco-flavored.翻译:从表面上看，美国的电子烟法规比欧洲和英国的法规要严格得多，要求公司证明对公共健康的净效益。迄今为止，该机构仅向 23 种电子烟产品授予了授权，全部为烟草味。

Yet those 23 products combined represented less than 3% of e-cigarette sales in the United States from July through September, according to the Circana data. In all, the data show more than 3,000 new vaping products have been introduced to the United States market over the past year.翻译:然而，根据 Circana 的数据，这 23 种产品加起来仅占美国 7 月至 9 月电子烟销量的不到 3%。数据显示，过去一年总共有超过 3,000 种新的电子烟产品引入美国市场。

Heaven Gifts launched the Elf Bar in the United States in late 2021 without getting FDA authorization to sell. Sales skyrocketed. Zhang saw weekly sales of Elf Bar and his other U.S. brands grow from less than $100,000 a week in early February 2022 to more than $9 million a week in early October 2023, according to data produced by Circana. Heaven Gifts products rang up about triple the sales of all the FDA-authorized products combined from July through September, the data show.翻译:Heaven Gifts 于 2021 年底在美国推出了 Elf Bar，但未获得 FDA 销售授权。销量猛增。根据 Circana 提供的数据，张看到 Elf Bar 和他的其他美国品牌的每周销售额从 2022 年 2 月上旬的每周不到 10 万美元增长到 2023 年 10 月上旬的每周超过 900 万美元。数据显示，从 7 月到 9 月，Heaven Gifts 产品的销量大约是 FDA 授权产品总销量的三倍。

After launching U.S. sales, Zhang quickly built out his distribution network and then introduced new brands alongside the Elf Bar. When the agency issued import alerts in May, seeking to block Heaven Gifts shipments, it included some brands but omitted others, including Lost Mary and Funky Republic.翻译:推出美国销售后，张迅速建立了自己的分销网络，然后在 Elf Bar 旁边引入了新品牌。当该机构于 5 月份发布进口警报，试图阻止 Heaven Gifts 发货时，其中包括了一些品牌，但忽略了其他品牌，包括 Lost Mary 和 Funky Republic。

Lost Mary sales jumped from less than $100,000 a week in September 2022 to more than $3 million for the first week of October, putting it among the top 10 U.S. disposable vapes, the data show.翻译:数据显示，Lost Mary 的销售额从 2022 年 9 月的每周不到 10 万美元跃升至 10 月第一周的超过 300 万美元，跻身美国一次性电子烟十大品牌之列。

Li said Heaven Gifts regularly adds new brands to diversify its product portfolio.翻译:李说，Heaven Gifts 定期添加新品牌以使其产品组合多样化。

“Staying ahead of regulators, honestly, is not on our agenda,” he said in a statement. “We must work with regulators instead of tiptoeing around them.”翻译:“老实说，保持领先于监管机构并不在我们的议程上，”他在一份声明中表示。 “我们必须与监管机构合作，而不是小心翼翼地绕过他们。”

The FDA faces a complex challenge in stopping the illegal vape import surge but has been “unacceptably slow” in responding, said Kurt Ribisl, a public-health professor at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.翻译:北卡罗来纳大学教堂山分校公共卫生教授库尔特·里比斯尔 (Kurt Ribisl) 表示，FDA 在阻止非法电子烟进口激增方面面临着复杂的挑战，但反应速度“慢得令人难以接受”。

“It’s kind of a cat-and-mouse game,” he said, “but the FDA is a slow-motion cat.”翻译:“这有点像猫捉老鼠的游戏，”他说，“但 FDA 是一只慢动作的猫。”

Reporting by Chris Kirkham in Los Angeles and David Kirton in Shenzhen, China; editing by Vanessa O'Connell and Brian Thevenot翻译:Chris Kirkham 在洛杉矶和 David Kirton 在中国深圳的报道；瓦妮莎·奥康奈尔和布莱恩·特维诺特编辑

item.title: 美国在海军舰艇中替代炸弹级铀的研究取得进展 - 文件
item.description:
U.S. research is advancing on the potential to change fuel for nuclear reactors on Navy submarines and aircraft carriers from bomb-grade uranium to a safer option, documents showed Wednesday, even as the program's funding is at risk in Congress.翻译:周三的文件显示，美国研究正在推进将海军潜艇和航空母舰上的核反应堆燃料从炸弹级铀改为更安全的选择的可能性，尽管该计划的资金在国会面临风险。

In order to lower proliferation risks of keeping stockpiles of highly-enriched uranium, the U.S. government has been exploring since 2018 how to use low-enriched fuel that cannot be used as fissile material in weapons.翻译:为了降低高浓缩铀库存的扩散风险，美国政府自2018年以来一直在探索如何使用不能用作武器裂变材料的低浓缩燃料。

The U.S. research program progressed from a planning phase into an "iterative experimental campaign phase" in fiscal year 2021 and early findings represent progress in what could be a 20-to 25- year design effort, said a report to Congress last year from the National Nuclear Security Administration (NNSA).翻译:美国国家科学院去年向国会提交的一份报告称，美国的研究计划在 2021 财年从规划阶段进入了“迭代实验阶段”，早期发现代表了可能需要 20 至 25 年设计工作的进展。核安全管理局（NNSA）。

The report, seen by Reuters, had not been revealed previously.翻译:路透社看到的这份报告此前并未披露过。

The issue of highly-enriched fuel in naval vessels is heightened by the $245 billion AUKUS defense technology partnership with Australia and Britain that provides for the sale of U.S. nuclear-powered submarines and sharing of nuclear-propulsion technology with Australia in response to China's growing power in the Indo-Pacific.翻译:海军舰艇中的高浓缩燃料问题因AUKUS与澳大利亚和英国价值2450亿美元的国防技术伙伴关系而变得更加严重，该伙伴关系规定出售美国核动力潜艇并与澳大利亚分享核推进技术，以应对中国日益增长的实力在印度-太平洋地区。

Non-proliferation experts say sending submarines to Australia that use highly-enriched uranium could set a precedent for other countries to use the fuel.翻译:防扩散专家表示，向澳大利亚派遣使用高浓缩铀的潜艇可能会为其他国家使用这种燃料开创先例。

The low-enriched uranium fuel program seeks to meet "the stringent requirements for the power output, compact size, and long-life the U.S. Navy requires," said the NNSA report.翻译:国家核安全局的报告称，低浓铀燃料计划旨在满足“美国海军对功率输出、紧凑尺寸和长寿命的严格要求”。

The document concluded that "initial activities are the first steps on a long, costly path to fuel development and success is not assured."翻译:该文件的结论是：“初步活动只是漫长而昂贵的燃料开发道路上的第一步，成功并不能保证。”

It also mentioned a 2016 report's findings that it could take over $1 billion to develop alternative fuel. The earlier report also said low-enriched fuel would negatively impact reactor endurance and ship costs and operational effectiveness.翻译:它还提到了 2016 年报告的调查结果，即开发替代燃料可能需要超过 10 亿美元。早些时候的报告还表示，低浓缩燃料将对反应堆耐久性、船舶成本和运行效率产生负面影响。

The 2022 report warned the costs could detract from higher-priority non-proliferation and naval propulsion research and development activities.翻译:2022 年报告警告称，这些成本可能会影响更优先的防扩散和海军推进研发活动。

Still, head of the NNSA Jill Hruby said in the document she was pleased with progress the program has made "in this technically challenging effort."翻译:尽管如此，国家核安全局负责人吉尔·赫鲁比在文件中表示，她对该项目“在这项技术上具有挑战性的工作中”取得的进展感到高兴。

NNSA did not immediately respond to questions about the documents.翻译:国家核安全局没有立即回应有关这些文件的问题。

Congress has given the program $100 million since 2016 but funding is in question after the subcommittee in the Republican-controlled House of Representatives this year voted to stop it. The Senate has approved funding and the two chambers are expected to work together to figure out any funding.翻译:自 2016 年以来，国会已为该计划提供了 1 亿美元，但在共和党控制的众议院小组委员会今年投票阻止该计划后，资金出现了问题。参议院已批准拨款，两院预计将共同努力确定拨款方案。

Alan Kuperman, a professor at the University of Texas at Austin and coordinator at the Nuclear Proliferation Prevention Project, has pushed the government to embrace low-enriched uranium for Navy vessels and obtained the documents from NNSA.翻译:德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校教授兼核扩散预防项目协调员艾伦·库珀曼（Alan Kuperman）推动政府为海军舰艇采用低浓铀，并从国家核安全局获得了文件。

"These documents clarify three things for the first time: the program is vital to preventing the spread of nuclear weapons, is making rapid progress, and will be implemented only if it can preserve the performance of U.S. Navy vessels," Kuperman said.翻译:库珀曼说：“这些文件首次澄清了三件事：该计划对于防止核武器扩散至关重要，正在迅速取得进展，并且只有在能够保持美国海军舰艇性能的情况下才会实施。”

He said the potential $1 billion cost for the fuel was small compared to trillions spent on the Navy's nuclear fleet.翻译:他表示，与海军核舰队花费的数万亿美元相比，燃料的潜在成本 10 亿美元是很小的。

The Defense Department did not immediately respond to a request for comment about the program.翻译:国防部没有立即回应有关该计划的置评请求。

Reporting by Timothy Gardner; Editing by Jamie Freed翻译:蒂莫西·加德纳的报道；杰米·弗里德编辑

item.title: 新疆审计后大众汽车股东要求加强审查
item.description:
Summary:
  • Audit raises more question that it answers - DKA
  • VW must regularly review Xinjiang site - Union Investment
  • Shares up 3.4% on relief over audit results
翻译:概括：
  • 审计提出的问题多于它回答的问题 - DKA
  • 大众必须定期审查新疆工厂 - 联合投资
  • 审计结果缓解，股价上涨 3.4%

Volkswagen must regularly check its operations in China to ensure its supply chains are safe and comply with human rights laws, two of the carmaker's investors said, after an audit of its jointly owned Xinjiang site found no sign of forced labour.翻译:大众汽车公司的两名投资者表示，在对其合资的新疆工厂进行审计后，没有发现强迫劳动的迹象，大众汽车公司必须定期检查其在中国的业务，以确保其供应链安全并遵守人权法。

The demands made by Union Investment and Deka Investment on Wednesday reflect ongoing concerns over Volkswagen's engagement in the Xinjiang region, where rights groups have documented abuses including forced labour in detention camps.翻译:联合投资和德卡投资周三提出的要求反映了人们对大众汽车在新疆地区参与的持续担忧，人权组织记录了新疆地区的虐待行为，包括在拘留营中强迫劳动。

Beijing denies any such abuses.翻译:北京否认有任何此类侵权行为。

The result of the Volkswagen-commissioned audit comes as Germany is carefully recalibrating its relationship with China, its biggest trading partner, to reduce its exposure to a market that is also a systemic rival.翻译:大众汽车委托的审计结果出炉之际，德国正在谨慎地重新调整与其最大贸易伙伴中国的关系，以减少其对这个也是系统性竞争对手的市场的敞口。

Volkswagen said on Tuesday that the much-anticipated audit, which was carried out by Germany's Loening Human Rights & Responsible Business GmbH and two Chinese lawyers from a firm in Shenzhen, had found no evidence of forced labour.翻译:大众汽车周二表示，由德国鲁宁人权与责任商业有限公司和深圳一家公司的两名中国律师进行的备受期待的审计没有发现强迫劳动的证据。

Loening, however, noted that the audit had been limited to the site, a joint venture with SAIC Motor (600104.SS), adding the situation in Xinjiang and the challenges in collecting data for audits were well known.翻译:不过，洛宁指出，审计仅限于与上汽集团（600104.SS）的合资企业，并补充说新疆的情况以及收集审计数据的挑战是众所周知的。

Germany's Association of Critical Shareholders (DKA), which represents small investors on environmental, social and governance issues, said the audit was raising more questions than it answers.翻译:在环境、社会和治理问题上代表小投资者的德国关键股东协会（DKA）表示，审计提出的问题多于它回答的问题。

"If even a single audit ... is so difficult, and can only happen without freedom of expression and labour union rights ... further audits can hardly be considered an effective measure," DKA co-managing director Tilman Massa said.

NO 'ONE-OFF EXERCISE'

While calling the audit a step in the right direction, Henrik Pontzen, who heads sustainability and ESG at Union Investment, said Volkswagen had not yet reached its goal.翻译:Union Investment 可持续发展和 ESG 主管 Henrik Pontzen 称此次审计是朝着正确方向迈出的一步，但他表示大众汽车尚未实现其目标。

"There is still a lot to do: In China, audits must not remain a one-off exercise. A functioning complaints management system must also be established," he said.翻译:“还有很多工作要做：在中国，审计不能只是一次性的。还必须建立一个有效的投诉管理体系，”他说。

He also said that Volkswagen's corporate governance, which has drawn criticism from some of its smaller shareholders, remained the Achilles heel of Europe's top automaker.翻译:他还表示，大众汽车公司的公司治理招致了一些小股东的批评，这仍然是这家欧洲顶级汽车制造商的致命弱点。

Ingo Speich of Deka Investment, which according to LSEG data owns $99 million worth of Volkswagen's preferred stock, welcomed the results of the audit but demanded more transparency in Volkswagen's supply chain.翻译:Deka Investment 的 Ingo Speich 对审计结果表示欢迎，但要求提高大众供应链的透明度。根据 LSEG 的数据，Deka Investment 拥有价值 9900 万美元的大众优先股。

"Investor pressure has worked. VW has followed the example set by BASF (BASFn.DE), which already started audits in China at a very early stage," he said.翻译:“投资者的压力发挥了作用。大众汽车效仿了巴斯夫(BASFn.DE)的榜样，该公司很早就开始在中国进行审核，”他表示。

Shares in Volkswagen were up 3.4% to 112.26 euros at 1144 GMT, lifting them to the top of the gainers on Germany's blue-chip index, with traders pointing to relief after index provider MSCI (MSCI.N) gave it a 'red flag' in its social issue category in 2022, prompting some investors to drop the stock.翻译:截至格林威治标准时间 1144 日，大众汽车股价上涨 3.4%，至 112.26 欧元，成为德国蓝筹股指数涨幅最大的股票，指数提供商 MSCI (MSCI.N)向其发出“危险信号”后，交易员表示松了口气。在 2022 年的社会问题类别中，促使一些投资者放弃了该股票。

Volkswagen's stock market value has halved to 57.6 billion euros in the past two years. Its shares are down 26% year-to-date, underperforming a 37% rise in the STOXX Europe 600 Auto index .翻译:过去两年，大众汽车的股票市值已减半至576亿欧元。其股价今年迄今已下跌 26%，表现落后于 STOXX Europe 600 汽车指数 37% 的涨幅。

The automaker's shares trade at just 3 times forward earnings over the next 12 months, down from 8.8 two years ago, which was the highest among its European competitors.翻译:该汽车制造商的未来 12 个月预期市盈率仅为 3 倍，低于两年前的 8.8 倍，是欧洲竞争对手中最高的。

The price-to-earnings ratio, widely used in financial markets to gauge the relative value of stocks, is now below the 5 for the European car sector.翻译:金融市场广泛用于衡量股票相对价值的市盈率，目前欧洲汽车行业的市盈率低于 5。

item.title: 中国启动世界首座第四代核反应堆
item.description:
China has started commercial operations at a new generation nuclear reactor that is the first of its kind in the world, state media said on Wednesday.翻译:官方媒体周三称，中国的新一代核反应堆已开始商业运营，这是世界上第一座此类核反应堆。

Compared with previous reactors, the fourth generation Shidaowan plant in China's northern Shandong province is designed to use fuel more efficiently and improve its economics, safety and environmental footprint as China turns to nuclear power to try to meet carbon emissions goals.翻译:与以前的反应堆相比，随着中国转向核电以努力实现碳排放目标，位于中国北部山东省的第四代石岛湾核电站旨在更有效地使用燃料，并改善其经济性、安全性和环境足迹。

Xinhua news agency also said the 200 megawatt (MW) high-temperature, gas-cooled reactor (HTGCR) plant developed jointly by state-run utility Huaneng, Tsinghua University and China National Nuclear Corporation, uses a modular design.翻译:新华社还称，由国有公用事业公司华能、清华大学和中国核工业集团公司联合开发的200兆瓦高温气冷堆（HTGCR）电站采用模块化设计。

Modular plants refer to those of less than 300MW that can be constructed off site. Proponents say they can operate in remote locations and power traditionally hard-to-abate heavy industry sectors, but critics say they are too expensive.翻译:模块化电站是指可异地建设的小于300MW的电站。支持者表示，它们可以在偏远地区运行，并为传统上难以减少的重工业部门提供动力，但批评者称它们太昂贵了。

NuScale Power, previously expected to be the first U.S. company licensed to build a small modular reactor, said this month it was terminating a planned 462MW project in Utah because of rising costs.翻译:NuScale Power此前预计将成为第一家获得建造小型模块化反应堆许可的美国公司，该公司本月表示，由于成本上升，将终止计划在犹他州进行的 462MW 项目。

China has a goal to produce 10% of electricity from nuclear by 2035 and 18% by 2060, but as of September this year had not met its 2020 target to install 58 gigawatts of nuclear capacity.翻译:中国的目标是到2035年核电发电量达到10%，到2060年核电发电量达到18%，但截至今年9月，尚未实现2020年核电装机容量58吉瓦的目标。

China has also not signed a pledge by 20 countries at the COP28 climate conference taking place in Dubai to triple nuclear power capacity by 2050.翻译:中国也没有在迪拜举行的COP28气候会议上签署 20 个国家承诺到 2050 年将核电容量增加两倍的承诺。

item.title: 战争风险上升促使财产保险公司重新考虑承保范围
item.description:
Insurers grappling with the rising risk of physical attacks on businesses due to war or civil disorder are reconsidering the breadth and scope of such cover in potential conflict hot spots.翻译:因战争或内乱而导致企业遭受人身攻击的风险不断上升，保险公司正在重新考虑潜在冲突热点地区此类保险的广度和范围。

Political violence cover, which businesses can take out to insure against physical damage caused by war, terror attacks, strikes or riots, can be bought as a standalone policy alongside property insurance or as part of a political risk package.翻译:企业可以投保政治暴力保险，以确保免受战争、恐怖袭击、罢工或骚乱造成的人身损害，可以与财产保险一起作为独立保单购买，也可以作为政治风险套餐的一部分购买。

However, international underwriters have largely pulled out from offering such policies in Ukraine following Russia's invasion and heavily scaled back business in Israel since its conflict with Hamas, industry sources told Reuters.翻译:然而，业内消息人士告诉路透社，在俄罗斯入侵后，国际承保商基本上不再在乌克兰提供此类保单，并在以色列与哈马斯发生冲突后大幅缩减在以色列的业务。

They are now weighing reduced coverage for other regions seen as potentially vulnerable to unrest in an effort to avoid losses, including in Taiwan, amid fears of an attack by China.翻译:由于担心遭到中国的袭击，他们现在正在考虑减少对其他被视为可能容易发生骚乱的地区的覆盖范围，以避免损失，其中包括台湾。

"There's a chance that the reaction to Ukraine and others is going to have more of an impact on other parts of the world that are not live situations right now but could be live in the future like Taiwan," said Tarique Nageer, terrorism placement advisory leader at broker Marsh.翻译:恐怖主义安置顾问塔里克·纳格尔表示：“对乌克兰和其他国家的反应有可能会对世界其他地区产生更大的影响，这些地区目前还没有出现这种情况，但将来可能会像台湾一样出现这种情况。”达信经纪公司的领导者。

Many of the political violence policies are written in the Lloyd's of London (SOLYD.UL) insurance market, as well as by insurers based in the United States and Bermuda, while separate war policies are offered in aviation and shipping.翻译:许多政治暴力保单是由伦敦劳合社 (SOLYD.UL) 保险市场以及美国和百慕大的保险公司制定的，而航空和航运领域则提供单独的战争保单。

"You can't get anything in Ukraine at this point in time. For places like Taiwan, available capacity has dropped maybe 50%, if not more," Nageer added.翻译:“目前在乌克兰你什么也买不到。对于像台湾这样的地方，可用产能可能下降了 50%，甚至更多，”纳格尔补充道。

Insurers had reduced political violence and broader political risk cover in Taiwan after Lloyd's asked its members earlier this year to identify potential exposure to so-called realistic disaster scenarios related to conflict in the region.翻译:劳合社今年早些时候要求其会员确定与该地区冲突相关的所谓现实灾难情景的潜在风险后，保险公司减少了台湾的政治暴力并扩大了政治风险范围。

Lloyd's chief executive John Neal told Reuters in September that the market's exposure to Taiwan was "manageable".

'HOUSE ON FIRE'

Since political violence policies are generally annual, insurers can make fairly rapid decisions not to renew them.翻译:由于政治暴力保单通常是年度保单，保险公司可以相当迅速地做出不续保的决定。

But some have even switched to offering monthly cover in Israel, said Hamish Greenwood, head of crisis management at insurance broker McGill and Partners.翻译:但保险经纪公司 McGill and Partners 的危机管理主管哈米什·格林伍德 (Hamish Greenwood) 表示，有些人甚至转而在以色列提供月度保险。

"Some syndicates offered 12-month cover just before Russia invaded Ukraine and people got burnt," he said.翻译:他说：“就在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰并导致人们遭受损失之前，一些犯罪集团提供了为期 12 个月的掩护。”

Others have dropped cover altogether, particularly for new clients, with insurance sources concerned about the conflict widening to neighbouring countries such as Lebanon.翻译:其他人则完全放弃了保险，特别是针对新客户，因为保险人士担心冲突扩大到黎巴嫩等邻国。

Greenwood said one client in Haifa, in northern Israel, who previously bought protection against $100 million of damage was now struggling to get $10 million of cover.翻译:格林伍德表示，以色列北部海法的一位客户之前购买了 1 亿美元的损失保险，现在却很难获得 1,000 万美元的保险。

"Effectively, you're insuring a house on fire," he added.翻译:“实际上，你是在为一座着火的房子投保，”他补充道。

Rates for political violence cover in Israel were already higher than other parts of the world due to the perceived risk.翻译:由于存在风险，以色列的政治暴力承保率已经高于世界其他地区。

"There's a lot more markets who are reluctant to write (cover for) Israel now than they were before. Israel may have seen 75% reduction in available capacity," Nageer said.翻译:“与以前相比，现在有更多的市场不愿意为以色列承保。以色列的可用产能可能减少了 75%，”纳格尔说。

Some rates have risen by 10 times or more in the past few months, Greenwood said, although an underwriter who declined to be named said rate rises were likely to be lower in parts of Israel further from Palestinian territories.翻译:格林伍德表示，过去几个月，一些利率上涨了 10 倍甚至更多，但一位不愿透露姓名的承销商表示，在远离巴勒斯坦领土的以色列部分地区，利率上涨可能会较低。

And insurers say business has not dried up completely.翻译:保险公司表示业务尚未完全枯竭。

"For longstanding clients who've bought cover, you don't want necessarily to drop the cover," said Roddy Barnett, head of political risks and trade credit at insurer Beazley (BEZG.L).翻译:保险公司 Beazley (BEZG.L) 政治风险和贸易信贷主管罗迪·巴尼特 (Roddy Barnett)表示：“对于购买了保险的长期客户来说，您不一定希望放弃保险。”

"We have been quoting on a little bit of business in Lebanon and in Israel, it's not like the market has run away."翻译:“我们一直在引用黎巴嫩和以色列的一些业务，市场并没有逃跑。”

item.title: 英格兰银行表示，英国目前正在应对更高的利率，但也看到了未来的风险
item.description:
LONDON, Dec 6 (Reuters) - British businesses and households are coping so far with higher interest rates but there are risks ahead for the financial sector from higher borrowing costs and changes to the way banks fund themselves, the Bank of England said.翻译:路透伦敦12月6日 - 英国央行表示，迄今为止，英国企业和家庭正在应对利率上升，但金融业面临借贷成本上升和银行融资方式改变等风险。

"The overall risk environment remains challenging, reflecting subdued economic activity, further risks to the outlook for global growth and inflation and increased geopolitical tensions," the BoE said on Wednesday.翻译:英国央行周三表示，“总体风险环境仍然充满挑战，反映出经济活动疲弱、全球增长和通胀前景面临进一步风险以及地缘政治紧张局势加剧。”

In its half-yearly Financial Stability Report, the BoE said stronger-than-expected wage and income growth since its last review in July had reduced some of the strain for households.翻译:英国央行在半年度金融稳定报告中表示，自 7 月份上次审查以来强于预期的工资和收入增长在一定程度上减轻了家庭的压力。

"Nevertheless, household finances remain stretched by increased living costs and higher interest rates, some of which has yet to be reflected in higher mortgage repayments," the BoE's Financial Policy Committee said.翻译:英国央行金融政策委员会表示：“尽管如此，由于生活成本增加和利率上升，家庭财务状况仍然紧张，其中一些因素尚未反映在抵押贷款还款额增加中。”

Businesses had also been broadly resilient to higher rates and weak growth "but the full impact of higher financing costs has not yet passed through to all borrowers," it said.翻译:报告称，企业对利率上升和经济增长疲软也普遍具有抵御能力，“但融资成本上升的全面影响尚未波及到所有借款人”。

The British central bank, worried about the long-lasting impact of last year's surge in inflation, raised interest rates at 14 meetings in a row between December 2021 and August this year to a 15-year high of 5.25% where they have sat since.翻译:英国央行担心去年通胀飙升的长期影响，在2021年12月至今年8月期间连续14次会议上调利率至5.25%，创下15年来的新高。

BoE officials acknowledge signs of a slowdown in the economy but say they are not thinking about cutting the Bank Rate because of signs that inflation pressure will stay strong.翻译:英国央行官员承认经济放缓的迹象，但表示他们不会考虑下调银行利率，因为有迹象表明通胀压力将持续强劲。

The BoE said that it was urging banks to plan ahead for potential challenges in the way that they fund themselves, given a switch in deposits from normal current accounts to fixed-term, higher-interest savings which cost them more.翻译:英国央行表示，鉴于存款从正常活期账户转向定期、利率较高的储蓄，这会增加银行的成本，因此它敦促银行提前做好自我融资方式的潜在挑战计划。

"The UK banking system is well capitalised and has high levels of liquidity," the BoE said, adding that net interest margins have probably peaked but profitability was expected to remain robust.翻译:英国央行表示：“英国银行体系资本充足，流动性水平较高。”他补充称，净息差可能已见顶，但盈利能力预计将保持强劲。

However, the run on Silicon Valley Bank in the United States earlier this year highlighted how lenders could be hit with sudden surges in withdrawals and the prospect of digital currencies also had implications for the stability of deposits at lenders.翻译:然而，今年早些时候美国硅谷银行的挤兑事件凸显了贷款机构可能会因取款突然激增而受到冲击，而数字货币的前景也对贷款机构存款的稳定性产生了影响。

Risks flagged by the BoE included upheaval in China's real estate market which could worsen, and the tensions in the Middle East which could push up oil prices and hurt economic growth.翻译:英国央行指出的风险包括中国房地产市场的动荡可能会恶化，以及中东的紧张局势可能会推高油价并损害经济增长。

Outflows from funds invested in risky corporate debt and increased short and long positioning by hedge funds and asset managers in U.S. Treasuries could fuel further market volatility, the BoE said.翻译:英国央行表示，投资于高风险企业债务的资金外流，以及对冲基金和资产管理公司增加美国国债空头和多头头寸，可能会进一步加剧市场波动。

The central bank said it would monitor in 2024 the risks posed by the rise of artificial intelligence.翻译:央行表示，将在2024年监测人工智能崛起带来的风险。

item.title: 穆迪下调前景使北京针对市场空头的“战争”变得更加复杂
item.description:
Summary:
  • Moody's move raises pressure on govt to do more to support markets
  • Confidence in Chinese assets could deteriorate further, analysts
  • Beijing's steps to bolster economy, markets have had modest effect so far
翻译:概括：
  • 穆迪的举动给政府带来了采取更多措施支持市场的压力
  • 分析师对中国资产的信心可能进一步恶化
  • 北京采取的提振经济和市场的措施迄今为止效果有限

Moody's negative outlook on China has intensified Beijing's battle with market bears, raising pressure on the government for more forceful measures to prop up sinking stocks and stabilise the yuan as investor confidence deteriorates.翻译:穆迪对中国的负面展望加剧了北京方面与市场空头的斗争，在投资者信心恶化之际，加大了政府采取更有力措施支撑下跌股市并稳定人民币汇率的压力。

In its Tuesday announcement, the ratings agency flagged weakening growth prospects, adding to mounting global concerns that China's economic miracle is over, potentially leaving the world's second-largest economy stuck in a middle-income trap.翻译:该评级机构在周二的声明中指出，增长前景疲软，加剧了全球对中国经济奇迹已经结束的担忧，可能会让这个世界第二大经济体陷入中等收入陷阱。

While keeping China's sovereign rating at A1, Moody's cut its outlook to negative from stable, citing surging municipal debt and property market woes. Such concerns have prompted other institutions to draw comparisons with Japan's similar macroeconomic symptoms before its "lost decades" of stagnation.翻译:在维持中国主权评级为 A1 的同时，穆迪将其前景从稳定下调至负面，理由是市政债务激增和房地产市场困境。这种担忧促使其他机构将日本在“失去的几十年”停滞之前的类似宏观经济症状进行比较。

Even though China's rising debt levels and over-reliance on property have long been part of the conversation, the voice of a ratings agency carried enough weight to renew a sell-off in Chinese assets and prompt state bank actions in markets.翻译:尽管中国不断上升的债务水平和对房地产的过度依赖长期以来一直是人们讨论的一部分，但评级机构的声音足以再次抛售中国资产，并促使国有银行在市场上采取行动。

"This is a financial war," said Yuan Yuwei, founder and CIO of Water Wisdom Asset Management.翻译:“这是一场金融战。”水智慧资管创始人兼CIO袁宇伟表示。

Moody's move "would trigger foreign reduction in Chinese assets, and would also push up China's funding costs, potentially leading to deterioration in asset quality."翻译:穆迪此举“将引发外资减持中国资产，也会推高中国融资成本，可能导致资产质量恶化”。

Authorities have taken a raft of economic support measures and targeted steps to prop up the stock market, including cutting stamp duty, slowing the pace of listings and getting state-backed funds to buy stocks.翻译:当局采取了一系列经济支持措施和有针对性的措施来支撑股市，包括削减印花税、放慢上市步伐以及让国家支持的资金购买股票。

In an apparent effort to calm the market, the official Shanghai Securities News reported on Wednesday that China's securities watchdog will promote reforms to attract more long-term capital into the market.翻译:官方《上海证券报》周三报道称，中国证券监管机构将推动改革，吸引更多长期资本进入市场，这显然是为了安抚市场。

And last week, state-owned China Reform Holdings Corp said it had started buying index funds to support the market, following a similar move by sovereign fund Central Huijin Investment.翻译:上周，国有国新控股公司表示，继主权基金中央汇金投资有限公司采取类似举措后，该公司已开始购买指数基金以支撑市场。

But, on the other side of the trade, the weakening prospects for the Chinese economy could prove hard to shake off as confidence remains low.翻译:但在贸易的另一面，由于信心依然低迷，中国经济前景疲软可能难以摆脱。

"The pressures on Chinese stocks and the economy more generally are likely to increase if the cost of insuring the sovereign debt continues to rise and bailouts begin," said Ryan Yonk, economist at the American Institute for Economic Research.翻译:美国经济研究所经济学家瑞安·永克表示：“如果主权债务的保险成本继续上升并且开始实施救助，中国股市和整体经济面临的压力可能会增加。”

Rob Carnell, Asia-Pacific Head of Research at ING said that China has used many tools already to drive up demand but with limited effect, "so getting people to regain confidence in this market is going to be really hard."翻译:荷兰国际集团(ING)亚太区研究主管罗布·卡内尔(Rob Carnell)表示，中国已经使用了许多工具来拉动需求，但效果有限，“因此让人们重拾对这个市场的信心将非常困难。”

Ultimately, analysts warn, sentiment can only stabilise sustainably if China delivers a credible longer-term roadmap for solving the structural weaknesses that are curbing its growth potential.翻译:最终，分析师警告说，只有中国提供可靠的长期路线图来解决抑制其增长潜力的结构性弱点，市场情绪才能持续稳定。

"The priority for China now is to stabilize growth momentum and raise confidence for the future," said Calvin Zhang, senior portfolio manager at Federated Hermes.翻译:Federated Hermes高级投资组合经理Calvin Zhang表示：“中国现在的首要任务是稳定增长势头并增强对未来的信心。”

China should increase fiscal spending and address local governments' hidden debt, Zhang said.翻译:张说，中国应该增加财政支出并解决地方政府的隐性债务。

In October, China unveiled a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan ($139 billion) in sovereign bonds by the end of the year, raising the 2023 budget deficit target to 3.8% of gross domestic product (GDP) from the original 3%.

YUAN WORRIES

China's blue-chip index (.CSI300) hit its lowest level in nearly five years on Wednesday.翻译:中国蓝筹股指数（.CSI300）周三触及近五年来的最低水平。

Major state-owned banks also stepped up U.S. dollar selling very forcefully on Tuesday, and again on Wednesday. China's central bank has used various tools in recent months to stem the yuan's slide, including stronger fixings before the market open.翻译:主要国有银行周二和周三也大力加大了美元抛售力度。近几个月来，中国央行使用了各种工具来阻止人民币贬值，包括在开盘前加强中间价。

Still, outflow pressure remains high.翻译:尽管如此，资金流出压力仍然很高。

China recorded its first-ever quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment in July-September, while Goldman Sachs data showed outflows from China reached $75 billion in September, the biggest monthly exodus since 2016.翻译:7月至9月，中国首次出现季度外国直接投资赤字，而高盛的数据显示，9月份中国的资金流出达到750亿美元，这是自2016年以来最大的月度资金外流。

Moody's outlook cut could raise the stakes further, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，穆迪下调前景可能会进一步增加风险。

"This is a blow to the already low investor confidence in China," said Qi Wang, chief investment officer of UOB Kay Hian's wealth management division in Hong Kong.翻译:大华继显香港财富管理部门首席投资官王琪表示：“这对中国本已低迷的投资者信心是一个打击。”

Sovereign credit is the foundation of Chinese assets, so the move "would certainly impact the yuan exchange rate, and reduce global investors' risk appetite."翻译:主权信用是中国资产的基础，因此此举“肯定会影响人民币汇率，并降低全球投资者的风险偏好”。

But not everyone is bearish.翻译:但并非所有人都看跌。

Rival ratings agencies Fitch Ratings and S&P Global Ratings have made no changes to their respective China credit ratings. Fitch affirmed China's A+ rating with a stable outlook in August, while S&P Global said on Wednesday it has retained China's A+ rating with a 'stable' outlook.翻译:竞争对手评级机构惠誉评级和标准普尔全球评级没有改变各自的中国信用评级。惠誉8月确认中国A+评级，展望稳定，标普全球周三表示维持中国A+评级，展望“稳定”。

Some market participants pointed to similar rating moves on the United States as having limited long-term market impact.翻译:一些市场参与者指出，美国类似的评级变动对长期市场影响有限。

"Just as most people shrugged off the U.S. downgrade, most investors will shrug off the China downgrade," said Jason Hsu, chief investment officer at Rayliant Global Advisors.翻译:“正如大多数人对美国评级下调不屑一顾一样，大多数投资者也会对中国评级下调不屑一顾，”瑞联全球顾问公司首席投资官 Jason Hsu 表示。

Reporting by Samuel Shen and Winni Zhou in Shanghai and Summer Zhen in Hong Kong; Ankur Banerjee in Singapore; additional reporting by Megan Davies in New York; Editing by Marius Zaharia and Shri Navaratnam翻译:Samuel Shen 和 Winni Zhou 在上海以及 Summer Zen 在香港的报道； Ankur Banerjee 在新加坡；梅根·戴维斯在纽约的补充报道；编辑：Marius Zaharia 和 Shri Navaratnam

item.title: 意大利奢侈品牌普拉达 (Prada) 计划在中期内将中国业务扩大一倍
item.description:
Prada is looking to double its business in key luxury market China, Chief Executive Gianfranco D'Attis said on Wednesday, even as the country faces slowing growth in luxury demand and significant economic headwinds.翻译:首席执行官吉安弗兰科·达蒂斯 (Gianfranco D'Attis) 周三表示，尽管中国面临奢侈品需求增长放缓和重大经济逆风，普拉达仍希望将其在主要奢侈品市场中国的业务扩大一倍。

"We have a lot of ambitions here in China, to double our business in the upcoming mid-term future. And with that comes also increasing our investments," D'Attis told reporters in Shanghai.翻译:“我们在中国有很多雄心壮志，希望在即将到来的中期将我们的业务翻一番。随之而来的是我们的投资增加，”达蒂斯在上海告诉记者。

He did not give an exact timeframe for the ambition but said increased investments would not necessarily mean a major uptick in the number of stores opening across the country.翻译:他没有给出具体的时间表，但表示增加投资并不一定意味着全国开设的商店数量大幅增加。

"Not only the number of stores is important to us, but the quality of stores, bigger stores with more categories, with more localized products, with more experiences, with more hospitality, more events, more special capsules," he said.翻译:他说：“对我们来说，重要的不仅是商店数量，还有商店的质量，更大的商店，更多的品类，更多的本地化产品，更多的体验，更多的热情款待，更多的活动，更多特别的胶囊。”

D'Attis, a former Dior executive who took the helm at Prada in January, was speaking at a preview of the brand's Pradasphere II exhibition in Shanghai. This is the second iteration of a concept that first showed in London.翻译:迪奥 (Dior) 前高管、一月份执掌普拉达 (Prada) 的达蒂斯 (D'Attis) 在上海举行的该品牌 Pradasphere II 展览预览会上发表讲话。这是首次在伦敦展示的概念的第二次迭代。

As well as a deep dive into the brand's archive and identity, Pradasphere II, which is showing at a museum on Shanghai's Huangpu River, also includes a Prada-themed cafe and a gift shop in a repurposed train parked alongside the museum.翻译:除了深入了解该品牌的档案和身份之外，在上海黄浦江边的一家博物馆展出的 Pradasphere II 还包括一家 Prada 主题咖啡馆和停在博物馆旁边的改装火车内的礼品店。

According to D'Attis, this likely won't be the last time fans of the brand in China get to enjoy something like the Prada cafe, which boasts premium Italian coffee. Developing a hospitality concept is on the agenda for the brand worldwide, including in China, he said, possibly in 2024 or 2025.翻译:达蒂斯表示，这可能不会是该品牌的中国粉丝最后一次享受像 Prada 咖啡馆这样的地方，那里提供优质的意大利咖啡。他表示，发展酒店理念已列入该品牌在全球（包括中国）的议程，可能会在 2024 年或 2025 年进行。

The Prada Group, whose brands also include classic English shoemaker Church's, reported a 10% rise in third quarter revenues in November, saying a strong performance in Asia and Europe helped to compensate for weakness in the Americas.翻译:Prada 集团旗下品牌还包括经典的英国鞋履制造商 Church's，该集团 11 月份公布的第三季度收入增长了 10%，称亚洲和欧洲的强劲表现有助于弥补美洲的疲软表现。

China is forecast to account for almost 40% of global luxury sales by 2030, according to consultants Bain.翻译:贝恩咨询公司预计，到 2030 年，中国奢侈品销售额将占全球奢侈品销售额的近 40%。

D'Attis is hopeful Chinese consumers will return to traveling and shopping in greater numbers in Europe, but said that wouldn't necessarily impact sales at home.翻译:达蒂斯希望更多的中国消费者将重返欧洲旅游和购物，但他表示这不一定会影响国内销售。

"Because we have such a different offer abroad than the local offer that we have, we believe that there is no cannibalization," he said.翻译:“因为我们在国外的报价与我们在当地的报价有很大不同，所以我们相信不会出现蚕食的情况，”他说。

"They will continue to spend locally, they will continue to be treated like kings and queens in China and when they travel, they get a different product... than they can find in China. So it's very complementary."翻译:“他们将继续在当地消费，他们将继续在中国受到国王和王后般的待遇，当他们旅行时，他们会得到与在中国不同的产品。所以这是非常互补的。”

Prada is not alone in remaining optimistic about China's post-pandemic market. Even as luxury growth slows in the world's second-largest economy, spooking investors, global brands from Louis Vuitton to Chanel have all recently staged events in cities such as Shanghai and Shenzhen.翻译:Prada并不是唯一一家对疫情后的中国市场保持乐观态度的公司。尽管全球第二大经济体的奢侈品增长放缓， 令投资者感到不安，但从路易威登到香奈儿等全球品牌最近都在上海和深圳等城市举办了活动。

Reporting by Casey Hall and Beijing newsroom; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Mark Potter翻译:凯西·霍尔和北京新闻编辑室报道；编辑：杰奎琳·黄和马克·波特

item.title: 王毅同布林肯强调推动中美关系稳定健康发展
item.description:
China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Wednesday that promoting healthy, stable and sustainable China-U.S. relations is an important task, in a phone call with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周三在与美国国务卿布林肯通电话时表示，推动中美关系健康稳定可持续是一项重要任务。

Blinken also discussed his recent travel in the Middle East and U.S. diplomatic efforts in the region with Wang, according to an earlier statement from the U.S. Department of State.翻译:根据美国国务院早些时候的声明，布林肯还与王毅讨论了他最近的中东之行以及美国在该地区的外交努力。

In the call, the two top diplomats exchanged views on the Israeli-Hamas conflict and agreed to maintain communication on the situation in the Middle East, according to a Chinese foreign ministry statement.翻译:据中国外交部声明，两国高级外交官在通话中就以色列与哈马斯冲突交换了意见，并同意就中东局势保持沟通。

Wang said during the conversation that the top priority at the moment is to cease fire and cease fighting "as soon as possible."翻译:王毅在谈话中表示，当前当务之急是“尽快”停火、停止战斗。

Blinken also thanked Wang for going to the U.S. Embassy in China to express his condolences to former U.S. Secretary of State Henry Kissinger, said the Chinese foreign ministry.翻译:中国外交部表示，布林肯还感谢王毅前往美国驻华使馆向美国前国务卿基辛格表示慰问。

Henry Kissinger, the most powerful U.S. diplomat of the Cold War era, who helped Washington open up to China, died last week.翻译:冷战时期美国最有权势的外交官、帮助华盛顿向中国开放的亨利·基辛格上周去世。

"Dr. Kissinger has always advocated that China and the United States should respect each other, evolve together, and fulfill their international responsibilities," Wang was quoted as saying in the phone call.翻译:王毅在电话中表示：“基辛格博士一贯主张中美应相互尊重、共同发展、履行国际责任。”

Wang also repeatedly stressed that the United States should fully understand the importance of the Taiwan issue to China, and that Kissinger's diplomatic legacy is worthy of being carried forward and developed by future generations.翻译:王毅还多次强调，美国应充分认识台湾问题对中国的重要性，基辛格的外交遗产值得后人继承和发展。

Wang and Blinken also emphasised the importance of building upon progress made on key issues in the summit between the countries' respective presidents in California in November, according to statements from their respective departments.翻译:根据各自部门的声明，王毅和布林肯还强调了在 11 月两国总统在加州举行的峰会上在关键问题上取得进展的重要性。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Kim Coghill翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；克里斯托弗·库欣和金·科吉尔编辑

item.title: 中国称其战机在台湾海峡跟踪美国海军巡逻机
item.description:
China's military said on Wednesday it sent fighter jets to monitor and warn a U.S. Navy patrol aircraft that flew over the sensitive Taiwan Strait, a mission that took place weeks before Taiwan holds elections.翻译:中国军方周三表示，已派出战斗机对飞越敏感的台湾海峡的美国海军巡逻机进行监视和警告，这项任务是在台湾举行选举前几周执行的。

China claims sovereignty over democratically governed Taiwan, and says it has jurisdiction over the strait. Taiwan and the United States dispute that, saying the Taiwan Strait is an international waterway.翻译:中国声称对民主治理的台湾拥有主权，并表示对该海峡拥有管辖权。台湾和美国对此存在争议，称台湾海峡是国际水道。

The U.S. Navy's 7th Fleet said the P-8A Poseidon maritime patrol and reconnaissance plane, which is also used for anti-submarine missions, flew over the strait in international airspace.翻译:美国海军第七舰队表示，P-8A海神海上巡逻侦察机也用于反潜任务，在国际空域飞越了海峡。

"The aircraft's transit of the Taiwan Strait demonstrates the United States' commitment to a free and open Indo-Pacific. The United States military flies, sails and operates anywhere international law allows," it said in a statement.翻译:“这架飞机飞越台湾海峡表明了美国对自由开放的印太地区的承诺。美国军队在国际法允许的任何地方飞行、航行和行动，”它在一份声明中说。

China's military described the flight as "public hype", adding it had sent fighters to monitor and warn the U.S. plane and "deal with it in accordance with the law and regulations".翻译:中国军方称此次飞行是“公开炒作”，并补充说已派出战机对美机进行监视和警告，并“依法依规予以处理”。

"Troops in the theatre are always on high alert and will resolutely defend national sovereignty and security as well as regional peace and stability," the Eastern Theatre Command of the People's Liberation Army said in a statement.翻译:解放军东部战区在声明中表示，战区部队始终保持高度戒备，坚决捍卫国家主权安全和地区和平稳定。

Taiwan's defence ministry said its forces monitored the U.S. aircraft as it flew in south through the strait, and described the situation as "normal".翻译:台湾国防部表示，当美国飞机向南飞经海峡时，台湾部队对其进行了监视，并称情况“正常”。

The last time the U.S. Navy announced a Poseidon had flown through the strait, in October, China said it had sent fighter jets to monitor and warn the aircraft.翻译:上次美国海军宣布波塞冬飞机飞越该海峡是在10月份，中国表示已派出战斗机对飞机进行监视和警告。

Taiwan is gearing up for presidential and parliamentary elections on Jan. 13, which China has cast as a choice between war and peace.翻译:台湾正在为 1 月 13 日的总统和议会选举做准备，中国将这次选举视为战争与和平之间的选择。

China has stepped up its military activity around Taiwan in the past four years, including staging two rounds of major war games over the last year and a half.翻译:过去四年来，中国加强了在台湾周边的军事活动，包括在过去一年半的时间里举行了两轮大型军演。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Additional reporting by Ben Blanchard in Taipei; Editing by Kim Coghill and Gerry Doyle翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道； Ben Blanchard 在台北的补充报道；金·科吉尔和格里·多伊尔编辑
